name: .BINARYCOOKIES
summary: Learn about .BINARYCOOKIES files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: BINARYCOOKIES files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the Apple Safari web browser on macOS and iOS, as well as iOS apps that include embedded web views, reference these files.
However, users who want to extract the cookies their BINARYCOOKIES files contain can do so using the open-source Binary Cookies Reader.
